item.title: Lizzy add a quote by Plato
item.description: "We can easily forgive a child who is afraid of the dark; the real tragedy of life is when men are afraid of the light." -- Plato

item.title: Lizzy add a quote by Osho
item.description: "Experience life in all possible ways -- good-bad, bitter-sweet, dark-light, summer-winter. Experience all the dualities. Don't be afraid of experience, because the more experience you have, the more mature you become." -- Osho

item.title: Lizzy add a quote by Woody Allen
item.description: "I'm not afraid of death; I just don't want to be there when it happens." -- Woody Allen

item.title: Lizzy add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "Darkness cannot drive out darkness: only light can do that. Hate cannot drive out hate: only love can do that." -- Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: Lizzy add a quote by Charles Bukowski
item.description:
"Do you hate people?
I don't hate them...I just feel better when they're not around." -- Charles Bukowski

item.title: Lizzy add a quote by Andre Gide
item.description: "It is better to be hated for what you are than to be loved for what you are not." -- Andre Gide

item.title: Lizzy add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "You know you're in love when you can't fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Lizzy add a quote by Edgar Allan Poe
item.description: "Those who dream by day are cognizant of many things which escape those who dream only by night." -- Edgar Allan Poe

item.title: Lizzy add a quote by Edgar Allan Poe
item.description: "All that we see or seem is but a dream within a dream." -- Edgar Allan Poe

item.title: Lizzy add a quote by Edgar Allan Poe
Lizzy add a quote by Edgar Allan Poe
item.description: "I have great faith in fools - self-confidence my friends will call it." -- Edgar Allan Poe

item.title: Lizzy add a quote by Edgar Allen Poe
item.description: "We loved with a love that was more than love." -- Edgar Allen Poe

item.title: Lizzy add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "If you tell the truth, you don't have to remember anything." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Lizzy add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Lizzy add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "Don't walk behind me; I may not lead. Don't walk in front of me; I may not follow. Just walk beside me and be my friend." -- Albert Camus

item.title: Lizzy add a quote by Maurice Switzer
item.description: "It is better to remain silent at the risk of being thought a fool, than to talk and remove all doubt of it." -- Maurice Switzer

item.title: Lizzy add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "I am so clever that sometimes I don't understand a single word of what I am saying." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Lizzy add a quote by Narcotics Anonymous
item.description: "Insanity is doing the same thing, over and over again, but expecting different results." -- Narcotics Anonymous

item.title: Lizzy add a quote by Gordon A. Eadie
item.description: "If you don't stand for something you will fall for anything." -- Gordon A. Eadie

item.title: Lizzy add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "The fool doth think he is wise, but the wise man knows himself to be a fool." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Lizzy add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "A woman is like a tea bag; you never know how strong it is until it's in hot water." -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Lizzy add a quote by Mae West
item.description: "You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough." -- Mae West

item.title: Lizzy add a quote by Tom Robbins
item.description: "There are many things worth living for, a few things worth dying for, and nothing worth killing for." -- Tom Robbins

item.title: Lizzy add a quote by Jeanette Winterson
item.description: "There are many forms of love and affection, some people can spend their whole lives together without knowing each other's names. Naming is a difficult and time-consuming process; it concerns essences, and it means power. But on the wild nights who can call you home? Only the one who knows your name." -- Jeanette Winterson

item.title: Lizzy add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "It is not a lack of love, but a lack of friendship that makes unhappy marriages." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Lizzy add a quote by Charles Schultz
item.description: "<b>I</b> love mankind ... it's <b>people</b> I can't stand!!" -- Charles Schultz

item.title: Lizzy add a quote by Lao Tzu
item.description: "Being deeply loved by someone gives you strength, while loving someone deeply gives you courage." -- Lao Tzu

item.title: Lizzy add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "Love looks not with the eyes, but with the mind, And therefore is winged Cupid painted blind." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Lizzy add a quote by Merrit Malloy
item.description: "One of the first things we have to let go of is not being able to let go of anybody." -- Merrit Malloy

item.title: Lizzy add a quote by John Ruskin
item.description: "I believe that the first test of a great man is his humility. I don't mean by humility, doubt of his power. But really great men have a curious feeling that the greatness is not of them, but through them. And they see something divine in every other man and are endlessly, foolishly, incredibly merciful." -- John Ruskin
